OtherEligibility.Name: Clear Eligibility
OtherEligibility.Description: A Personal Current Account or a Clear Current Account is only available to you if you are a personal customer aged 18 years or over.
OtherEligibility.Textual: A Personal Current Account or a Clear Current Account is only available to you if you are a personal customer aged 18 years or over.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Fee Free transactions
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free unlimited transactions in and out of the account

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: E-Statements
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free e-statements

FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free unlimited transactions (ATM withdrawals in the UK)

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Money Manager
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: With Money Manager you can track, analyse and understand your spending, check upcoming expenses and plan for any savings in the future.

FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free debit card purchases in-store or online.

FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free withdrawals and lodgements at Post Office� counters

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: International debit card
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Your card can be used in-store or online, at home and abroad.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Branches
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: You can use any of our Bank of Ireland branches in Northern Ireland

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: 365 Online
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: 365 Online banking is available to manage the account

FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Mobile banking app is available to manage the account

FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Tablet app available is to manage the account

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Free international transfers to EU
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free international Euro transfers to the EU/EEA, including Bank of Ireland accounts in ROI.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Pay to Mobile
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: With Pay to Mobile you can transfer money to another Bank of Ireland UK account simply by using the mobile number of the account holder.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Switch Incentive
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: �100 for customers switching through Current Account Switch Service (CASS)

FeatureBenefitEligibility.Name: Switch Incentive
FeatureBenefitEligibility.Description: Customers from a Bank at Work scheme with Bank of Ireland UK who switch using Current Account Switch Service (CASS).

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: 0% interest free overdraft
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Interest free overdraft for 3 months from account opening.

FeatureBenefitEligibility.Name: 0% interest free overdraft
FeatureBenefitEligibility.Description: Customers who switch using the Current Account Switch Service (CASS).

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: No unarranged charges
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: No unarranged overdraft charges applied for 3 months from account opening.

FeatureBenefitEligibility.Name: No unarranged charges
FeatureBenefitEligibility.Description: Customers who switch using the Current Account Switch Service (CASS).

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: International Payments
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Allow payments to either be sent to or received from accounts abroad.

Notes: International payments. Receiving payments from abroad: If you have a Bank of Ireland UK account �6. Transferring payments abroad: - Through our branches: If you ask us to send a payment to another country �25. If you ask us to send a payment to Bank of Ireland in the Republic of Ireland �10 (If the details of the bank that the payment is going to are quoted incorrectly, we will charge an extra �10.) - Through 365 online: If you ask us to send a payment to another country �15. If you ask us to send a payment to Bank of Ireland in the Republic of Ireland �0. - Through our branches or 365 online: Euro payments: If a payment request meets the following criteria no charges will apply: The payment is in Euros. The payment must be going to an EU/EEA country. The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary is provided. The Bank Identifier Code (BIC) of the beneficiary bank is provided. The beneficiary�s name and address is provided. There is no specified value date. The charges option SHARED must be selected. - Bank of Ireland UK standard charges for international payments will apply if: The payment is a currency other than Euros, or in Euros but going outside of the EU/EEA. The payment request is for the same day or next day. The beneficiary IBAN or BIC is not supplied or these are incorrect.

International payments. Receiving payments from abroad: If you have a Bank of Ireland UK account �6. Transferring payments abroad: - Through our branches: If you ask us to send a payment to another country �25. If you ask us to send a payment to Bank of Ireland in the Republic of Ireland �10 (If the details of the bank that the payment is going to are quoted incorrectly, we will charge an extra �10.) - Through 365 online: If you ask us to send a payment to another country �15. If you ask us to send a payment to Bank of Ireland in the Republic of Ireland �0. - Through our branches or 365 online: Euro payments: If a payment request meets the following criteria no charges will apply: The payment is in Euros. The payment must be going to an EU/EEA country. The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary is provided. The Bank Identifier Code (BIC) of the beneficiary bank is provided. The beneficiary�s name and address is provided. There is no specified value date. The charges option SHARED must be selected. - Bank of Ireland UK standard charges for international payments will apply if: The payment is a currency other than Euros, or in Euros but going outside of the EU/EEA. The payment request is for the same day or next day. The beneficiary IBAN or BIC is not supplied or these are incorrect.
Receiving Payments from Abroad (BOI UK account)
Payment Transfer Abroad (BOI in the Republic of Ireland)

OtherEligibility.Name: Graduate Eligiblity
OtherEligibility.Description: The Graduate Current Account is only available to you if you have graduated from full time 3rd level education within the last 3 years.
OtherEligibility.Textual: The Graduate Current Account is only available to you if you have graduated from full time 3rd level education within the last 3 years.

If you ask us to send a payment to Bank of Ireland in the Republic of Ireland �10 (If the details of the bank that the payment is going to are quoted incorrectly, we will charge an extra �10.) - Through 365 online: If you ask us to send a payment to another country �15. If you ask us to send a payment to Bank of Ireland in the Republic of Ireland �0. - Through our branches or 365 online: Euro payments: If a payment request meets the following criteria no charges will apply: The payment is in Euros. The payment must be going to an EU/EEA country. The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary is provided. The Bank Identifier Code (BIC) of the beneficiary bank is provided. The beneficiary�s name and address is provided. There is no specified value date. The charges option SHARED must be selected. - Bank of Ireland UK standard charges for international payments will apply if: The payment is a currency other than Euros, or in Euros but going outside of the EU/EEA. The payment request is for the same day or next day. The beneficiary IBAN or BIC is not supplied or these are incorrect.
Receiving Payments from Abroad (BOI UK account)
Payment Transfer Abroad (BOI in the Republic of Ireland)

OtherBankInterestType.Name: General Eligiblity
OtherBankInterestType.Description: A person in second level education aged between 11 and 19 or a person in year 7 of primary level education planning to go to second level education.

FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free unlimited transactions in and out of the account

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: E-Statements
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free e-statements

FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free unlimited transactions (ATM withdrawals in the UK)

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Free withdrawals from Bank of Ireland in Ireland
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free unlimited ATM withdrawals from Bank of Ireland cash machines or branch counters in Ireland

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Free standing orders
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free unlimited standing orders allowed

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Free direct debits
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free unlimited direct debits allowed

FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free chequebook

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Money Manager
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: With Money Manager you can track, analyse and understand your spending, check upcoming expenses and plan for any savings in the future.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Free debit card purchases in the UK
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free debit card purchases in-store or online.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: International debit card
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Your card can be used in-store or online, at home and abroad.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Free international transfers to EU
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Free international Euro transfers to the EU/EEA, including Bank of Ireland accounts in ROI.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Pay to Mobile
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: With Pay to Mobile you can transfer money to another Bank of Ireland UK account simply by using the mobile number of the account holder.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: 0% interest free overdraft
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Interest free overdraft for 3 months from account opening.

FeatureBenefitEligibility.Description: Customers who switch using the Current Account Switch Service (CASS).
